question.questionText: Under what circumstances will a switch affect a bulb?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: When the switch and the bulb are contained in the same path

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: when the switch is on a closed path with the bulb
if the switch and the bulb are on the same path.
When the bulb and switch are contained in the same path.
if it disrupts the path of the bulb and the battery
